CreateUI.headerDescription: Add a new item to the database.
CreateUI.DescriptionPlaceholder: Enter a detailed description for the item

FormsSchema.MinNameString: The name must contain at least 2 characters
FormsSchema.MinDescriptionString: The description must contain at least 10 characters
FormsSchema.MinBrandString: The brand must contain at least 2 characters
FormsSchema.MinLocationString: The location must contain at least 2 characters
FormsSchema.MinSKUString: The SN/Reference must contain at least 2 characters
FormsSchema.MinOriginString: The origin must contain at least 2 characters
FormsSchema.MinInsuranceValueString: The insurance amount must be greater than 0
FormsSchema.MinLength: The length must be a positive value
FormsSchema.MinWidth: The width must be a positive value
FormsSchema.MinHeight: The height must be a positive value
FormsSchema.MinWeight: The weight must be a positive value
FormsSchema.MinHsCodeString: The HS code must contain at least 2 characters
